sentences.en: (= after that time ) we were the best of friends.
sentences.cn: 从那以后我们就成了最好的朋友。

sentences.en: A moment later we heard a splash.
sentences.cn: 过了一会儿，我们听到哗啦一声。

sentences.en: A moment later, Cohen picked up the phone. "Hello?"
sentences.cn: 过了一会儿，科恩接起电话。“喂？”

sentences.en: A moment or two later champagne in an ice-bucket materialized beside them.
sentences.cn: 片刻之后，他们身边出现了一只装着香槟的冰桶。

sentences.en: At that moment, there was a rattling at the door.
sentences.cn: 那时，突然出现咚咚的敲门声。

sentences.en: At this moment in time it would be inappropriate to comment on the situation.
sentences.cn: 这个时候恐怕不宜对局势作出评论。

sentences.en: Can you spare a few moments to answer some questions?
sentences.cn: 你能抽点时间回答几个问题吗？

sentences.en: Could I speak to you in private a moment, padre.
sentences.cn: 可否私下跟您谈谈，牧师。

sentences.en: Gail was silent for a moment, regarding Harry with his steady gaze.
sentences.cn: 盖尔镇定地注视着哈里，沉默了片刻。

sentences.en: He is unpredictable, weeping one moment, laughing the next.
sentences.cn: 他喜怒无常，一会儿哭，一会儿笑。

sentences.en: He was here a moment ago .
sentences.cn: 他刚刚还在这里。

sentences.en: He'll be here to see you any moment now.
sentences.cn: 他马上就会来这儿看你。

sentences.en: He's touring South America at this moment in time.
sentences.cn: 他此刻正在南美旅游观光。

sentences.en: His face, at the moment, was peeling from sunburn.
sentences.cn: 那时他的脸因为晒伤而脱皮。

sentences.en: I had my moments in the game.
sentences.cn: 我也曾在赛场上名噪一时。

sentences.en: I just this moment (= only a very short time ago ) arrived and already Dan wants to know when I’m leaving.
sentences.cn: 我才刚到，丹就想知道我什么时候走。

sentences.en: I remember now. He arrived just at the moment it happened.
sentences.cn: 现在我想起来了，他恰恰在事情发生的时候到了。

sentences.en: I remember the moment when I first saw him after the operation.
sentences.cn: 我还记得手术后第一次见到他的那一刻。

sentences.en: I'll be back in a moment.
sentences.cn: 我一会儿就回来。

sentences.en: I'll report back the moment I have located him.
sentences.cn: 我一找到他就马上汇报。

sentences.en: In that moment a surge of hatred flowed through my blood.
sentences.cn: 那一刻，一股仇恨在我的血液中翻涌。

sentences.en: It took a moment for Mark to recover his poise.
sentences.cn: 马克过了一会儿才恢复镇静。

sentences.en: It was an unbelievable moment when Chris won the gold medal.
sentences.cn: 克里斯赢得金牌的那一刻令人不可思议。

sentences.en: It was one of the most exciting moments in his life.
sentences.cn: 这是他一生中最激动人心的时刻之一。

sentences.en: It was quiet for a moment, then Rae spoke.
sentences.cn: 沉寂了片刻，然后雷开始说话了。

sentences.en: Quinn always seems to be in the right place at the crucial moment.
sentences.cn: 奎因似乎总能在关键时刻把握时机。

sentences.en: She concealed her pregnancy right up to the moment of birth.
sentences.cn: 她隐瞒了自己怀孕的事，直到孩子出世。

sentences.en: She may be in trouble at this very moment and trying to call you.
sentences.cn: 此时此刻她可能遇到了麻烦，正想方设法给你打电话。

sentences.en: the buzzword of the moment.
sentences.cn: 现时的时髦词。

sentences.en: the fugitive was captured in a moment.
sentences.cn: 逃亡者马上就被抓住了。

sentences.en: the heavens opened the moment we left the house.
sentences.cn: 我们一离开家就下起倾盆大雨。

sentences.en: We have to be ready to leave at a moment’s notice (= very quickly ) .
sentences.cn: 我们必须准备好随时就走。

n. 最后一刻；紧急关头
